name: hn-hiring-lens
description: Chrome extension to filter and highlight comments on HN threads

scripts.watch: nodemon --watch content.js --watch styles.css --watch manifest.json --watch icons --ext js,css,json,png,svg --ignore dist/** --exec "npm run build"
scripts.test: npm run validate && npm run lint
scripts.release: npm run test && npm run package

author: HN Thread Filter Team
